sources: File containing all the sources referenced in the text.
last_update: The time of the last file update, represented as Unix Epoch time.
authors: Names of the individuals who contributed to editing the text.
reviewers: Names of the individuals who reviewed the text.

content.id: Unique identifier for the current section.
desc: Additional description for the text displayed on screen.
content.jumpTo: ID of the section to jump to.
content.answer: Value indicating the correct answer to be selected.
content.score: Numeric value awarded when the reader reaches the goal. It is recommended to assign at least one point to encourage learning.
content.position: Position of the content on screen: top/center/topCenter

levels.id: Unique identifier for the top-level section
levels.name: Name displayed on screen.
Name displayed on screen.
levels.target: ID of the top-level section this level is associated with.
levels.loadID: ID of the file to be loaded.
